General.Name: Kailong High Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Kailong High Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and after-sales service of SCR exhaust after-treatment products. The company offers light and heavy duty diesel, marine/stationary engine, gasoline engine, and CNG engine after treatment systems, as well as diesel particulate filters, exhaust treatment devices for tunnel/industrial stoves, vehicle exhaust heating systems, auto temperature-control cooling systems of engine, and centralized lubrication systems of passenger-carrying chassis, etc. Kailong High Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.
